snippet: The International Olympic Committee said it would create a mourning area in the Olympic Village at next year’s Rio de Janeiro Games where participants could remember family or friends during a moment of reflection at the closing ceremony.
abstract: International Olympic Committee will create mourning area at 2016 Summer Games in Rio de Janeiro, where participants can remember and reflect on those who have lost their lives at Olympic Games in past.
lead_paragraph: The International Olympic Committee said it would create a mourning area in the Olympic Village at next year’s Rio de Janeiro Games where participants could remember family or friends during a moment of reflection at the closing ceremony.

headline.main: Area to Be Set for Mourning
